attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded this app, every bug in the book came to my house. Keep in mind i live with little kids. It was chaos until i deleted the app. I like to say it was a sign from God to not support this disgrace of a cheeto.
attributes.title: Bug Infestation

attributes.review: I let my youngest on my phone for all of 5 minutes, the next thing I know he’s become a racist orange. So, I took my phone to the Apple store and, as it turns out it had been hacked. I had to buy a completely new phone. NOT OK
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I would leave a zero star review if I could. This app took weeks to load, and it turned my entire display orange. It gave my phone a terrible virus, and I most definitely do not recommend. Do. Not. Download!
attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible

attributes.review: Garbage. It allowed racism and police brutality into my phone. I can’t get rid of it because the Trump that comes with the app refuses to do anything about it! Either fix you AI Trump bot or expect your it to be removed next update by Anonymous!😡😡
attributes.title: My Phone Has A Virus Now

attributes.review: Thing is the most annoying horrible stupid app I ever downloaded it took me a whole day get to get this thing working after it started to work I gave MY PHONE STARTED TO SHUT OFF AND ON AND THE MY LIGHTS STOPED WORKING RHEN TURNED BACK  and then my 😡🤬PHONE STOP WORKING FOR A HOUR A HOUR LIKE REALLY 🧚🏿‍♂️🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.review: this app is the worst thing i have ever had it caused me to be infested with cockroaches every time i get on it. and every time i turn my phone on it opens the app and trump comes into my room and decks me in the face. this needs to be fixed immediately.
attributes.title: EVIL

attributes.review: this app raided my phone with bugs then people came to my house and took my dog and sacrificed him to the cult of orange trump and i was crying bc i only have my dog and that orange of a president slapped me then sold my rat and i was crying bc he was the last thing other than my dog and my rat gave him rabies so karma but now i’m all by myself with no rat or dog to keep me company and now my phone don’t work and my fingers are missing and trump ate my fridge that why he built like that thank u for ur time💅🏽🤬🤯✨✨🤠
attributes.title: trash app

attributes.review: I am a proud trump supporter and I downloaded this app. Before I knew it my son started screaming the n word over and over again!!! I asked where he learned that word as we don’t cuss and he said “trump app”. I was shocked! I was horrified! This app teaches racism! I now no longer support trump
attributes.title: Racist!

attributes.review: This is a terrible app it took a whole day to install and was glitching while in the app. It constantly kicked me out without me purposely exiting the app. Altogether this is a terrible app and should not be able to download, I am disgusted
attributes.title: Terrible experience

attributes.review: I would say I like the app but in all honesty. This app is just trash. Wouldn’t recommend it glitched and my phone froze for like 3 hours. Had to go to the Apple store and actually had to buy a new phone.
attributes.title: Never again
